name: imoji: 3D Face Emoji
description:
Turn your face into a 3D emoji! The camera captures your facial expressions and head movements, and maps them onto all kinds of fun emojis. You can record clips and share them with your friends.

Capture your emotions on all kinds of different AR emojis, including a dog, cat, dragon, dolphin, robot, wolf, unicorn, giraffe, parrot, panda, bunny, and bird. More face avatars coming soon!

GET imoji UNLIMITED ACCESS
Upgrade to imoji Unlimited Access for premium features, including: Unlimited access to all avatars and environments, monthly updates to all new avatars and environments, and first access to new features like special effects when they come out.

------------------------------------------------------

imoji Unlimited Access costs $2.99 USD per month. Payments will be charged to your iTunes account at comfirmation of purchase. Account will be charged for renewal on the last day of the current period. Subscription automatically renews monthly, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can can cancel at any time by going to Account Settings.

Photocreds: https://www.wemoji.co/photocreds
Terms: https://www.wemoji.co/terms
Privacy: https://www.wemoji.co/privacy
